didYouKnow.title: Did you know that Ireland is an ideal country for solar power?
didYouKnow.subtitle: FOR YOUR POCKET, FOR THE ENVIRONMENT
facts: Excellent annual daylight – solar power is generated from daylight.
You do not need the sun to generate power.
Solar PV power generation is more efficient at lower temperatures.
SEAI grants of up to €2,100 available to most.
Our rain washes your solar panels, so maintenance free.
Most systems will typically pay for themselves in about 5 years and keep producing free electricity for approx 30 years.
